title: Travel in winter
part1: Do you prefer snowy and magical Christmas? Or lack of sunlight make you feel low?
part2: Have holidays near astounding landscapes covered with a large white coat, rent a chalet for a cocooning week or fly for ski vacations and learn about winter sports.
part4: Escape cold winter for heavenly beaches. Escape for the tropical sun. Discover unique landscapes and discover new cultures.
part5: So many places to spend your dream holidays during December, January or February.
